column4: Anyone able to help with a fairly complex install? I've got an older computer without a working CD/DVD drive, currently running Crunchbang Statler (don't ask how I installed it in the first place...), trying to install from a Natty alternate ISO located on the hard drive.
if you currently have Grub installed on the system, it is possible to boot ISO images (don't ask me how, no idea)
That's the plan. Problem is adding the custom menu entry to do so.
